name: NETXP LINUX Inter-Process Communication - IPC System Calls:
description: Monitors Inter-Process Communication (IPC) system calls, including msgctl, msgget, semctl, semget, semop, semtimedop, shmctl, shmget. Detection of IPC system calls helps in monitoring communication between processes and identifying potential security risks.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "Inter-Process_Communication" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
